statements: SELECT * FROM online_teaching_evaluation;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM online_teaching_evaluation;
SELECT id, course_name, evaluation_score FROM online_teaching_evaluation WHERE evaluation_score > 4.5;
SELECT assessment_date, course_name FROM online_teaching_evaluation WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT student_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM online_teaching_evaluation GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT id, course_name, evaluation_score FROM online_teaching_evaluation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_name, assessment_date FROM online_teaching_evaluation WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(evaluation_score), course_name FROM online_teaching_evaluation GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(evaluation_score) > 4;
SELECT student_id, course_name, MAX(evaluation_score) AS highest_score FROM online_teaching_evaluation GROUP BY student_id, course_name;
SELECT id, course_name, assessment_date FROM online_teaching_evaluation WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM online_teaching_methods;
SELECT id, method_name, effectiveness_score FROM online_teaching_methods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, method_name FROM online_teaching_methods WHERE effectiveness_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM teaching_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score < 5;
SELECT teacher_name, student_name, evaluation_score FROM teaching_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM online_teaching_methods WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT method_name, teacher_name, effectiveness_score FROM online_teaching_methods ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_effectiveness_score FROM online_teaching_methods GROUP BY teacher_name;
SELECT * FROM teaching_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 8 AND evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT teacher_name, student_name, evaluation_score FROM teaching_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Classroom;
SELECT student_name, join_date, graduation_date FROM Student;
SELECT classroom_name, start_date, end_date FROM Classroom WHERE classroom_id = 'c6f4ef6c-6bbd-4b96-9442-d5382f7a3050';
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, score FROM Evaluation WHERE score > 90;
SELECT student_name, classroom_name, evaluation_date FROM Student s JOIN Classroom c ON s.classroom_id = c.classroom_id JOIN Evaluation e ON s.student_id = e.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Classroom WHERE teacher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_id, student_name, join_date FROM Student WHERE classroom_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT classroom_name, start_date, end_date FROM Classroom ORDER BY start_date, end_date;
SELECT evaluation_id, student_id, evaluation_date, score FROM Evaluation WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, classroom_name FROM Student s INNER JOIN Classroom c ON s.classroom_id = c.classroom_id WHERE graduation_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT name, department FROM teachers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, name, teaching_experience FROM teachers WHERE department='Math';
SELECT student_id, name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY grade_level ASC;
SELECT course_name, students_enrolled FROM courses WHERE students_enrolled < 50;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT name, department FROM teachers WHERE teaching_experience > 5;
SELECT student_id, name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, students_enrolled FROM courses WHERE students_enrolled < 20 ORDER BY students_enrolled ASC;
SELECT e.student_id, s.name, e.evaluation_score FROM evaluations e JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id WHERE e.evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT instructor_name, course_name, assessment_type FROM instructors JOIN courses ON instructors.instructor_id = courses.instructor_id JOIN assessments ON courses.course_id = assessments.course_id WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY instructor_name ASC, assessment_type DESC;
